name: Infinite Sky (itch) (Coruscare)
description:
Infinite Sky is a game about a mouse riding a dragon, a game about fighting for as long as you can, and "ultimately a game about life itself".

Made by Lonely Studios in partial fulfillment of a game development class.

Credits:

  • Coruscare: Programming and sprites
  • Finn_Ukato: Programming and audio
  • hja190: Programming
  • Brian Foster: Sidhe font, listed as free for commercial use (https://www.fontspace.com/sidhe-font-f3649)
  • RavenTale: Parallax background, licensed under CC0 (https://raventale.itch.io/parallax-background)
